com.foreach.across.modules.entity.config.builders

Class EntityListViewFactoryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.config.builders.EntityViewFactoryBuilder
      • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.config.builders.EntityListViewFactoryBuilder

  • @Component
 @Scope(value="prototype")
public class EntityListViewFactoryBuilder
extends EntityViewFactoryBuilder
    Extends the default EntityViewFactoryBuilder with properties for a list view of entities instead of a single entity view.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

      • entityQueryFilter

        public EntityListViewFactoryBuilder entityQueryFilter(boolean enabled)
        Enable default EntityQuery based filtering for this list. Amounts to the same as manually registering a EntityQueryFilterProcessor using filter(EntityViewProcessor).

        Calling with false will remove the processor if it was activated before. But you will have to manually reset the pageFetcher(EntityListViewPageFetcher) to the instance you want used.

        Parameters:
        enabled - true if filter should be added, false if not (or removed again)
        Returns:
        current builder

      • filter

        public <U extends EntityViewProcessor & EntityListViewPageFetcher> EntityListViewFactoryBuilder filter(U filterProcessor)
        Configure a filter to apply to the list view. Shortcut to adding both a viewProcessor(EntityViewProcessor) and pageFetcher(EntityListViewPageFetcher). Use entityQueryFilter(boolean) if you only want the default query language based filter to be added.
        Type Parameters:
        U - filter type
        Parameters:
        filterProcessor - instance
        Returns:
        current builder
